data.name: Alesund
data.description: A soft and durable fabric designed with incredible texture and the ideal color dyes for a cozy day in.\A Please note that all colors will vary approximately 10 - 15% between dye lots.

data.name: Moonstone
data.description: A luxurious velvet with a soft plush touch, this fabric is perfect pared down with minimalist hues or dressed up in this season.\A Please note that all colors will vary approximately 10 - 15% between dye lots.

data.name: Solstice
data.description: A luxurious velvet with a soft plush touch and muted sheen, this fabric is perfect pared down with minimalist hues or dressed up in this season's trends. Our most revered velvet fabric colors, reimagined in the Plush Velvet 2022 collection.\A Please note that all colors will vary approximately 10 - 15% between dye lots.

data.name: Pearl
data.description: Chatou Bouclé reflects the tonal beauty of natural materials in its rich texture. Its composition of tightly looped fibers results in extraordinary softness, durability, and longevity.
